loot_dropped.title: Loot Dropped
loot_dropped.description: The loot from the till has been dropped on the ground at store (%s).

loot_collected.title: Loot Collected
loot_collected.description: Has collected the loot of $%s at store (%s).

hacked_network.title: Hacked Network
hacked_network.description: Successfully hacked the network for the safe code at store (%s).

opened_safe.title: Opened Safe
opened_safe.description: Successfully opened the safe with the code (%s) at store (%s).

looted_safe.title: Looted Safe
looted_safe.description: Successfully looted the safe at store (%s).

store_cooldown.title: Store Reset
store_cooldown.description: They have reset the store cooldown at store (%s).

error.active: A store is already being robbed!
error.cooldown: All stores are on a global cooldown!
error.not_enough_police: There are not enough police available, needs %s.
error.incorrect_code: You have entered the incorrect code for the safe.
error.global_cooldown: There is no global cooldown active.
